page.title: 18RECREATION: Public Houses
page.content: We interviewed three licencees in three separate areas of Bury. {Dukes}is a thirty year old building that has been modernised from paved floors and bricked bare walls to red, grey and mirrored walls.They have a separate lounge and games room containing games for snooker and pool enthusiasts.They have a childrens' playground and as it is quite big, they cater for weddings. {The White Horse}is a building that has a games room in which you can play snooker and darts.On special occasions like Halloween there are parties held and fancy dress in January. {The Printer's Arms}is a late 1700 building, which has a restaurant and a beer garden.The games room supplies facilities for pool, darts and cards.
